content: this is a very quick soft and squishy chicken plush made from ultra soft blanket yarn this project works up so quickly and is a perfect addition to your craft show booths terminology us - this pattern is written in us terminology materials loops and threads blanket yarn 6mm hook tapestry needle scissors polyfil stitch markers crochet stitches used single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet decrease scdec half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch this pattern was written and designed by me cloverandoak for personal use only please do not redistribute this pattern you may sell your finished works you have made with the pattern but please give credit pattern may not be used in video tutorials if you have any questions please contact me
